blog.name: pokemongoexcitement
blog.description: Just a blog about my adventures on Pokemon games. Pokemon Let's Go spoilers will be marked as Pokemon Let's Go Spoilers, Pokemon LGPE Spoilers, Pokemon Spoilers, and Spoilers. Pokemon Sword and Shield spoilers will be marked as Pokemon Sword and Shield, Pokemon Sword and Shield Spoilers, Pokemon Spoilers, and Spoilers.

summary: So there are a few Pokemon in Pokemon Go I’m considering of transferring to Let’s Go.  One of them is a Golbat my oldest niece...
body:
So there are a few Pokemon in Pokemon Go I’m considering of transferring to Let’s Go. 

One of them is a Golbat my oldest niece helped catch on one of my visits to them. My mom, brother, my now sister-in-law, the niece (my other niece wasn’t born at the time), and my nephew went out on a trail for a quick walk. I think it was a trail, at least; it was a while ago, and in an area without mountains and many trees, the trail seemed more like a spread out park to me. My mom, brother, and I all played Pokemon Go, but the niece and nephew were too young to have smartphones, so my nephew played a bit on my brother’s phone and my niece used mine. I thought my niece was going to lose the Golbat-Pokemon regularly flee from me-but she got it. 

The other is a Growlithe. The first time I saw one in Pokemon Go, it fled almost immediately, and ever since then it had appeared on my radar but never where I could catch it. I even called it my nemesis species, given how rare it seemed. But then one time I’d had a pretty bad day. My mom decided to try to take my mind off of it by taking me to visit my cousins, though I would’ve rather have stayed home. It was then that finally a Growlithe showed up to let me capture it. It wasn’t really enough to cheer me up-what had made it a bad day was pretty serious and couldn’t be turned around by a Pokemon-but it broke the curse I’d had with finding and catching them. 

I’d kind of like to take them into the main games and allow them a chance to shine on there, since I can’t really do too much with them in Pokemon Go.

blog.name: inikavulpixelreviews
blog.title: Let's Talk About Pokemon!
blog.description:
Reviewing my personal opinion on every single Pokemon! Yes, all 809 of them!
(Mostly) Daily Uploads, 3 PM EST.

summary: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Swirlix and Slurpuff
title: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Swirlix and Slurpuff
body:
684: Swirlix

We had a Pokemon based around smelling sweet, so why not have its version counterpart be based on tasting sweet? Swirlix is another mono-Fairy type, though notably less creepy looking than Spritzee (or maybe more creepy, depending on what your idea of creepy is.) This Pokemon is based on cotton candy of all things, eating lots of sugar and growing a coat of fur that apparently at least feels like cotton candy. It can even stand on its tail to look like cotton candy on a stick. Hah, that’s kinda cute. It’s even got a real cute face only the more fitting for a cotton candy monster!

Personal Score: 8/10

Adorable!

685: Slurpuff

Slurpuff easily builds off on Swirlix’s features and only amplifies them more. Looking a bit like a stubby dessert dog, Slurpuff here is rather obviously a sugar gremlin set out on eating all the sugar it can. I love the candyland sort of aesthetic, but I never thought it’d be something that’d work out entirely coherently for Pokemon. Yet here I am, liking a goofy cake-looking dog. And what better way to help introduce the Fairy type than bring in a sugar-addicted candy monster?

Personal Score: 8/10

Puffection

Overall:

Another sourly underappreciated pair.

[Archive]

[[MORE]]

summary: From 10/15/18 - 10/18/18, the TwitchPresents marathon is LIVE this week with Pokémon Advanced Battle! Episodes from season 8...
body:
From 10/15/18 - 10/18/18, the TwitchPresents marathon is LIVE this week with Pokémon Advanced Battle!

Episodes from season 8 (the FINAL season dubbed by 4Kids) include the conclusion to the Magma & Aqua arc with Groudon vs. Kyogre, the infamous “THUNDER ARMOR”, Coordinator Harley’s introduction, a Snorunt Ash encounters, Max & Ralts ;___;, meeting a Munchlax, May’s first Grand Festival, The Hoenn League championships, an exhibition battle with Agatha, the start Ash’s Battle Frontier quest, and much much more!

13 episodes per day (from Monday-Thursday) will rerun in 4 times just so you won’t miss the stream depending on your schedule: 10am | 3:47pm | 10:20pm | 2:53am (PDT, UTC−07:00)

Watching with Twitch chat could be the best (or worst) experience you’ll ever have! But if you want a more comfy chat experience, feel free to talk/chat about the marathon in my Pokémon Discord server PokéTōku —> Invite link here :)

Ohh oh-oh-oh oh-oh 🎶
I’m unbeatable! ~

blog.description: 24, F, Graphic designer student. Loves the shit out of old mecha animes and robot related stuff. Transformers and Brave series is my true love! (Brave Police J-Decker especially~) Likes to draw and do fanart, which is mostly what you're gonna find here and some shit posts.

summary: Inktober - Fav Ghost Pokémon Day 15: Lampent I think this is one of the cutest yet the most convenient Pokémons, if you think...
caption:
Inktober - Fav Ghost Pokémon

Day 15: Lampent

I think this is one of the cutest yet the most convenient Pokémons, if you think about it, you have a lamp/light and a ghost in and the same thing/creature.
Its handy and spooky.

- If you want to know which challenge I’m doing for this one, I’ll put
a link here: eled0ra.tumblr.com/post/151186…

Hoopa - 720
title: Hoopa - 720
body:
In its true form, it possess a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.

- Pokemon Omega Ruby

summary: My copy arrived! This was my first zine & I had so much fun. Thank you guys @sinnohfanzine and thanks @ all the other artists,...
body:
My copy arrived! This was my first zine & I had so much fun. Thank you guys @sinnohfanzine and thanks @ all the other artists, every single piece turned out amazing 👏

My roommate is already waiting impatiently behind me to finally have a look at it :D

reblog.comment:
My copy arrived! This was my first zine & I had so much fun. Thank you guys @sinnohfanzine and thanks @ all the other artists, every single piece turned out amazing 👏

My roommate is already waiting impatiently behind me to finally have a look at it :D
